ygData.subject: Re: Re: Eldritch Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Some Tips: I made a couple of rebreathers at skill 111, costed me 25,000 pp to make 5 of them and 4 aqualungs where left What I did is I made a High Elf
ygData.messageBody:
Some Tips:
I made a couple of rebreathers at skill 111, costed me 25,000 pp to make 5
of them and 4 aqualungs where left

What I did is I made a High Elf pumpled CHA into him, twinked him a bit he
had 198 CHA anyways I could buy all the stuff for aqualungs for about 200
pp , and total cost for rebreather works to about 1000 pp / try . costed
about 5000 pp each.

so 1 / 5 tries it actualy worked on the avarage, also have the tinkering
books in your GENERAL INVENTORY, aqualungs are actualy 1 /2 tried with the
books about 1 / 3 without the books

anyways you get your main guy stand by the mule and the mule buys ( takes 2
accounts tho ).

anyways it works out great like that. But now the problem is selling those
rebreathers on our server most people won't buy them for over 2 KPP, and I
dont really like loosing 3,000 pp.

Anyways the point of this thread is just to give tips, and I think if you
guys also have some tips it would help a lot, on how to maybe reduce the
cost or somthing like that etc.,

But we need to help each other


ALSO: maybe we should ALL do a /feedback and ask them to give more useble
stuff to tinkering, also maybe we can start a big post on the Offical
Massage board, I think we should fight for our skill, I mean look at
Shamans they got Alchamy working , and it is a great class-only skill, why
don't we make Verant get off their ass and make them do somthing about
tinkering.

like also tell us if that Diamond Dust actualy exist, like we been
searching for it for what 2 month now ?!

-50 lvl nec , Emarr, gnome, skill 111
